summary: An easy-to-install version of a whole bunch of mods that improve Skyrim. For all the lazy people out there.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][b][u][b][color=#ff0000]WARNING: THIS MOD REQUIRES SKYRIM LEGENDARY EDITION + BETHESDA HI-RES DLC
[b][u][b][color=#ff0000]WARNING: THIS MOD REQUIRES SKSE[/color][/b][/u][/b][/color][/b][/u]
[u][b][color=#ff0000]WARNING: THIS IS A BETA VERSION
[u][b][color=#ff0000]WARNING: INSTALL ON A CLEAN SAVE[/color][/b][/u][/color][/b][/u]

Introduction:[/b][/color]
I always had problems with installing too many mods, incompatibilities and crashes, so then I decided to make all my mods work together and easy to install. This compilation includes a huge variety of mods that enhance every aspect of the game. I do not recommend installing it together with other mods. I may update and add more information in the future.

[color=#ffff00][b]Installation:
[/b][/color]Just like any other mod, drag and drop everything in the data folder, either manual or using a mod manager.

[b][color=#ffff00]Load order:[/color][/b]
  0  0 Skyrim.esm
  1  1 Update.esm
  2  2 Dawnguard.esm
  3  3 HearthFires.esm
  4  4 Dragonborn.esm
  5  5 Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch.esp
  6  6 Falskaar.esm
  7  7 Wyrmstooth.esp
  8  8 [JmV]LTTF.esm
  9  9 JSwords.esm
 10  a Solstheim Climate Overhaul.esm
 11  b Grytewake.esm
 12  c ClimatesOfTamriel.esm
 13  d ORS_SolitudeGate.esm
 14  e LB_MuchAdoSnowElves.esm
 15  f Gray Fox Cowl.esm
 16 10 ORS_MorthalPain.esm
 17 11 notice board.esp
 18 12 moonpath.esm
 19 13 HighResTexturePack01.esp
 20 14 HighResTexturePack02.esp
 21 15 HighResTexturePack03.esp
 22 16 SkyUI.esp
 23 17 RaceMenu.esp
 24 18 RaceMenuPlugin.esp
 25 19 USC - Main Hi-res.esp
